content: If i try: http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4/ValueSet/179789/$expand i get unable to find code system http://sequenceontology.org which is odd as i can retrieve the CodeSystem via http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4/CodeSystem?url=http://sequenceontology.org

@Patrick Werner Heh, you have discovered a bug!

It turns out that if you update a CodeSystem resource and change the CodeSystem.url value as a part of the update, the terminology service doesn't recognize the change. Neat.

Fixing now.

@Patrick Werner Fixed and redployed.

You;ll have to force a change to your CS resource though for the fix to be picked up.
